page.title: 15Thorpe Hall.Middleton.
page.content:
{ {1.How old is Thorpe Hall? The Hall was built in the 1700's. 2.What was it used for? People used it for shelter. 3.Is the building now dangerous? Yes 4.Is the Hall open to the public? No because it is unsafe. 5.Are there any scary stories about the Hall? Lots and lots.All old buildings seem to attract this sort of story. 6.Have you had any vandalism? Never.Nobody seems to know the Hall is here. 7.Is the Hall used today? No.The building is too damp and too big.
Interview by Sarah Karen Zoe Tracy and Sharon.
